original_title: Diario de confesiones íntimas y oficiales
overview: Using archival material from Argentine television programs from 2001 and personal television archives from 89-91, Marilina Giménez, the director, traces part of her personal history in which she narrates her first lesbian relationship with Marina La Grasta, musician of the current group Ibiza Pareo. "If our desires are impossible we will be a mystery": the symbolic violence of les no representades is transformed into a banner of rage and pride.
title: Diario de confesiones íntimas y oficiales
